agents.agent_description: Uses biometric or OTP to verify customer identity during high-risk transactions.
Continuously analyzes stock market trends, news, and sentiment to identify trading opportunities.
Executes buy/sell orders based on predefined strategies and real-time market conditions.
Monitors exposure, adjusts stop-loss limits, and prevents excessive losses.

user_query: Authenticate the user via OTP, analyze tech sector sentiment, and place a buy order for AAPL if sentiment is positive. Adjust stop-loss if high volatility is detected.
